Balthus Knight Captain Stig Mach:
We are about to head out to defeat Antharas with all that the Balthust Knights got.
But I don't think you are ready.
Press the 'Tap' key and you will see the Balthus Knights Supply Box. Double-click to get the Soulshots, Blessed Spiritshots, and Beast Soulshots, and register them in the shortchuts. Then right-click to activate them, and use them during battle.
Let me know once you are ready.
